name: Fast Data Technology
overview: Fast Data Technology, Inc. engages in the development and deployment of content control and analysis solutions for the employee Internet management industry. Its products include FastTracker, an employee Internet management solution that manages the online employee requires new standards, re-engineered procedures, and information about employee surfing patterns; and Custom Text Analysis and Search Technology, a judgment-based content analysis for information retrieval. Fast Data Technology, Inc. also offers internet filter and management services, such as email filtering, internet monitoring, and text-analysis. The company was founded as FatLine Corporation in 1999 and changed its name to Fast Data Technology, Inc. in 2003. Fast Data Technology, Inc. is based in Boulder, Colorado.
